Let\[H(n)=\min_f \max_{X\subseteq \{1,\ldots,n\}} \left\lvert \sum_{x\neq y\in X} f(x,y)\right\rvert,\]where $f$ ranges over all functions $f:X^2\to \{-1,1\}$. Estimate $H(n)$.



Erd\H{o}s \cite{Er63d} proved\[\frac{n}{4}\leq H(n) \ll n^{3/2}.\]Erd\H{o}s and Spencer \cite{ErSp71} proved that $H(n)\gg n^{3/2}$.




References


[Er63d] Erd\H{o}s, P\'al, On combinatorial questions connected with a theorem of
{R}amsey and van der {W}aerden. Mat. Lapok (1963), 29--37.

[ErSp71] Erd\H{o}s, P. and Spencer, J., Imbalances in {$k$}-colorations. Networks (1971/72), 379--385.
